sentences.sContent: I seemed to spend my life running errands for people.
sentences.sCn: 我好像一辈子都在为别人跑腿。

sentences.sContent: She was always sending me on errands.
He quickly set out on his errand of mercy (= journey to help someone in danger ).
sentences.sCn: 他迅速启程参加救援行动。

phrases.pCn: 徒劳的奔波；徒劳无功的工作

remMethod.val: err(漫游) + and → 跑来跑去 → 差使

trans.tranOther: a short journey in order to do something for someone, for example delivering or collecting something for them
